title: How to Make Ecuadorian Shrimp Ceviche
steps: Bring a large pot of water to a boil.
Add the shrimp to the pot.
Remove the shrimp from heat and drain.
Refrigerate the ceviche for one hour.

title: How to Make Guava Juice
steps: Strain and thin the guava puree.
Stir in lime, honey, and salt.
Taste and serve the guava lime juice.
